name: 陳協慶
objective:
此課程旨在以人因觀點，探討智慧生活之產品與服務。授課主要以個案探討方式，使學生了解人因相關概念與方法，特別是使用者經驗與人本設計，以及如何將這些概念與方法導入組織中，並應用於相關產品與服務之開發與設計。
This course focuses on the products and services of smart living from the perspective of human factors. Courses will generally be taught through case studies. Students will learn the concepts and methods related to human factors, especially user experience and user centered design, and how these concepts and methods to be introduced into organizations and applied to the development and design of those products and services.
